changes: Added protection against a common error caused by failure to adjust notifications
Added Config.AutoExecuteQuery - automatic execution of SQL query to add required tables and columns
Added auto-detect for skin creator and spawn selector
Compatible with QBOX
Added Config.CameraHeight & Config.CameraForward
Added Config.Hud for the ability to hide the hud in the menu
Added Config.UseRoutingBuckets - this allows you to completely fix the problem with visibility or collisions between players in the menu, with the help of moving the player to a virtual world
Changed from Config.CameraZHeight to Config.CameraHeightPoint
Changed position from Diamond Casino to next to the field at Lost MC
Fixed removal of the only character
Added Config.UseQBHouses - to loading owned qb-houses with qb-garages houses (QB-Core)
Fixed console command addslots (QB-Core)
Fixed a problem with pressing the play button too fast
Fixed Config.SelectFirstChar
Added Config.SkipSpawnSelector to be able to use the spawn on the previous location without the spawn selector for QB-Core
Added Config.SelectFirstChar - it will select first possible player character by first connection on the server - recommended use
Added secured Config.StarterItems & Config.StarterMoney to config_server.lua file
Added some hints to Config.UsersDatabase on how to add options there (ESX)
Added the /addslots command for use only in the server console or through the tebex api, so you can sell slots on your server using the tebex store
Improved the function openSpawnSelector on config_server.lua for QB-Core
Fixed the command /setslots
Added Config.UseCustomSpawnSelector
Added function openSpawnSelector() to config_server.lua
Removed notification "Wait for your character to load", now you don't have to wait for the character to go in front of the camera, you can select the character earlier
Config.SkyCoords removed (this is taken from Config.Spawn)
Fixed an issue with disabling Config.ChangeCharacterPoint
Added qb-core DrawText to point of Config.ChangeCharacterPoint (QB-Core)
Added automatic loading of the correct gender of the one selected in identity into Config.UseCustomSkinCreator
Fixed problem with error display from es_extended when creating a new character (bad argument #1 to 'for iterator') (ESX)
Improved character creation in the default qb-clothing character creator (QB-Core)
Added Config.SkinManager which fixes black screen and character not loading issue - for fivem-appearance & illenium-appearance (QB-Core)
Fixed the reload UI when selecting a character
Changed UI loading when joining the server (Only after pressing a particular slot does the character come in) (ESX)
Corrected commands for QB-Core
Fixed UI loading error after character deletion (QB-Core)
Changed UI loading when joining the server (Only after pressing a particular slot does the character come in) (QB-Core)
Fixed problem with not being able to move after creating first character
Fixed problem with loading female ped model during character selection
Fixed the reload ui when deleting of characters
Changed in sql file from users to players
Compatible with QB-Core
Added Config.CameraZHeight
The problem with the active camera has been fixed
Fixed an issue with the character select button when a notification was displayed
Fixed spawn location on first login use Config.SpawnLocation
Fixed female character issues
Compatibility with custom character creators
Fixed a small bug with the camera during character creation
Compatible with fivem-appearance
